channel.title: Need help
channel.description: Need help with puting rules in the ::help command so please some one help me out befor i mess every thing up on my sever i am new to making server's so plz's help.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 10:26:53 PM[/size][hr][quote="hellzowner"]Need help with puting rules in the ::help command so please some one help me out befor i mess every thing up on my sever i am new to making server's so plz's help.[/quote] is any one going to help me or do no one know

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @katzcinky katzcinky
item.description:
@katzcinky wrote:

wow. alright ill help

step 1: open client.java

step 2: cntl + F --> Type "welcome to " (with no “”) and then click ‘find next’ twice.

step 3: now u can edit the messages in that menu, which can be opened using ::help or ::mainmenu. dont forget quotes for text, and commas befor the line number (which is like 8150-8199 or sumthing, too lazy to care)

step 4: tell katzcinky that he owns.

step 5: jk dont do that. hav fun

Read full topic
